T02D2098:101b-14: gsang sngags ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu lha'i 'khor lo ste /
T02D2098:101b-17: rig sngags rnams la thams cad ces bya'o //
T02D2098:101b-18: de dag ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo gzung ngo //
T02D2098:101b-19: de nyid kyi rigs shes par yang bya'o //
T02D2098:101b-20: rigs chen ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin lnga pa dang drug pa'o //
T02D2098:101b-21: kho bo ni rigs 'pho bar 'dod pa ste /
T02D2098:101b-22: dam pa'i zhal las 'ongs pa ni rgyas gdab gsum
T02D2098:101b-23: gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te mdor bstan
T02D2098:101b-24: pa'o // gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
T02D2098:101b-25: zhes pa ni gsang sngags la sogs pa ni rig sngags kyi las byed cing /
T02D2098:101b-26: don bsgrubs na 'chang ba ste las kyi rigs so //
T02D2098:101b-27: yang na thams cad shes rab kyi rtags su shes par byas la /
T02D2098:101b-28: des de la nan tan du byas pas de 'grub ces pa'o //
T02D2098:101b-29: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rigs gsum ste /

T02D2098:101b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni //
T02D2098:101b-32: zhes bya ba la rnam par gzigs ba ni sku'o //
T02D2098:101b-33: 'jig rten ni log pa'i shes pas brtags pa'i 'khor ba ste /
T02D2098:101b-34: de nyid rang gi ngo bo rnam par dag pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la /
T02D2098:101b-35: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mgos pas na padma'i rigs so //
T02D2098:101b-37: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las gti mug la sogs kyis mi 'ching //
T02D2098:101b-38: rang rang nyid ni rdzogs byang chub //
T02D2098:101b-40: 'jig rten gzugs la sogs pa ste //
T02D2098:101b-41: snang ba'i dbang po'i yul du 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2098:102a-0: de'i byed pa po ni mnyam pa nyid @102a * //
T02D2098:102a-2: rin po che'i rigs la phyogs med pas na chen po'o //
T02D2098:102a-3: phyag rgyan ni khyab cing mi 'da' ba'i don gyis te /
T02D2098:102a-6: rigs lnga dbyer mi phyed pas rtsod 'das kyi rigs so //
T02D2098:102a-7: rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po ste /
T02D2098:102a-8: rigs bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'khor rnams la
T02D2098:102a-9: zil gyis mi gnon pa'i skye mched yod pa dang
T02D2098:102a-10: rang nyid kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa'i skye mched
T02D2098:102a-11: kyi 'khor rnams rigs drug gi rgyud du mkhyen pas
T02D2098:102a-12: gtsug tor cher gzigs nas zhes bya'o //
T02D2098:102a-13: gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug la dgongs pa dang /
T02D2098:102a-14: 'bras bu kho na lam du bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2098:102a-15: rigs drug gi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D2098:102a-16: tshig ces pa ni tshig gi rgyud do //
T02D2098:102a-17: bdag po ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste rdo rje 'chad do //
T02D2098:102a-18: tshigs su bcad pa ni rkyang ba bsdus pa'o //
T02D2098:102a-19: bka' stsal pa shugs kyis shes par bya ste /
T02D2098:102a-20: longs spyod rdzogs pa chen po dang /
T02D2098:102a-23: gsang sngags ni skye ba med pa'i snying po can yi ge aa'o //
T02D2098:102a-24: rgyal po ni thams cad kyi bdag bor gyur bas so //
T02D2098:102a-25: drug ni sde tshan shes rab kyi yi ge'o //
T02D2098:102a-26: ldan pa ni sde tshan bdun pa'i thabs kyi yi ge'o //
T02D2098:102a-27: de mtshon byed du gyur cing //
T02D2098:102a-28: thun mong dang mchog gi nus pa 'byung zhing shes par bya'o //
T02D2098:102a-29: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang //
T02D2098:102a-30: zhes bya ba ni ma ning yi ge'i rang bzhin mtshon bar bya'o //
T02D2098:102a-31: mi skye ba ni ngo bo ste chos so //
T02D2098:102a-32: chos ni rkyen las skyes pa ste chos can no //
T02D2098:102a-33: can ni tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02D2098:102a-34: de ltar gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yongs su
T02D2098:102a-35: dag cing dri ma med pa ji ltar gnas she
T02D2098:102a-36: na / ring thung gi bye brag gis rigs dang rigs kyi ye shes so //
T02D2098:102a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
T02D2098:102a-38: mtshan dang dpe byad kyi 'khor lor snang ba dang /
T02D2098:102a-39: sna tshogs dkar dmar gyi rnam par snang ba ni gdul bya'i snang ba'i khyad par te /
T02D2098:102a-40: de nyid rnam par dag pa dang rnam pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ai a'i zhes bya'o //
T02D2098:102a-41: rin po che'i rigs ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02D2098:102b-0: thun mong ma @102b yin pa'i dbang po'i longs spyod du gyur pa dang /
T02D2098:102b-1: thun mong gi dbang po'i sbyod yul du gyur pa ni gdul bya'i dbang po'i khyad par te /
T02D2098:102b-2: rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas mtha'
T02D2098:102b-3: bzhi la mi gnas pa ni aoo aoo zhes bya'o
T02D2098:102b-4: // padma'i rigs ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
T02D2098:102b-5: khro ba dang mnyam pa dang zhi ba'i khyad par
T02D2098:102b-6: gyi rigs bsdus rgyas bye brag tu snang ba dang
T02D2098:102b-7: / rnam shes skye ba'i sgo tha dad par snang ba ni gdul bya'i dbang po'i khyad par te /
T02D2098:102b-8: rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas kun
T02D2098:102b-9: nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rgyud
T02D2098:102b-10: gcig tu gnas pa au a'u zhes bya'o ;
T02D2098:102b-11: / las kyi rigs ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te /

T02D2098:102b-13: dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid rang dang mthun pa'i don byed /
T02D2098:102b-14: gdul bya'i snang ba'i khyad par te /
T02D2098:102b-15: rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas 'bad
T02D2098:102b-16: pa med par rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba ni
T02D2098:102b-17: aam a'o // rdo rje'i rigs chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
T02D2098:102b-18: thams cad gcig tu gyur pa nyid dang /
T02D2098:102b-19: sgro skur dang bral ba nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang gang zag gi khyad par te /
T02D2098:102b-20: rang gi ngo bos ni gcig la rtag tu 'byung
T02D2098:102b-21: ba dang rjes 'jog tu gnas pas rnam par dag
T02D2098:102b-22: pa dang / rnam par dag pas 'di'i zhes 'ga' la yang mi gnas pa'i ae aee zhes bya'o //
T02D2098:102b-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes te /
T02D2098:102b-24: gzugs can ma yin pa dang /
T02D2098:102b-26: yul la mi gnas pa dang /
T02D2098:102b-28: phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad de'i ngo bor gcig pa dang /
T02D2098:102b-29: zug rdu gang gis kyang ma gos pa'i ye shes
T02D2098:102b-30: snang ba med pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'i lus
T02D2098:102b-32: mtshan ma thams cad rang grol bas dbang po rang
T02D2098:102b-33: bzhi zhing ming gis dben pa'i zung 'jug rgyud las
T02D2098:102b-34: skyes pa ni / rigs thams cad ye shes thams cad nyid yin pas rtsod 'das zhes bya ste /
T02D2098:102b-35: dbye ba med pa la aa a'a zhes bya'o //
T02D2098:102b-36: de rtogs par bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i
T02D2098:102b-37: blo'i khyad par nang rten cing 'brel te 'byung bas
T02D2098:102b-38: 'jug pa ste / sthi to hr'i de zhes bya ba ni re zhig pa'i gnas mtshon pa ste /
T02D2098:103a-2: dzny'a na zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /
T02D2098:103a-4: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes gnas de dag tu rnyed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2098:103a-5: m'urti zhes bya ba ni spyi gcug la bya ste /
T02D2098:103a-6: phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas 'khrul 'khor gyi
T02D2098:103a-7: sbyor bas lam nges par sbyangs nas thig le'i rnal
T02D2098:103a-8: 'byor gyis shigs pa med pa'i yi ge ham las
T02D2098:103a-9: byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa 'dren cing rol pas

T02D2098:103a-14: ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba ni ra ste rdo rje dang padma'o //
T02D2098:103a-15: de yang ye shes kyi byed pa po dang phrad
T02D2098:103a-16: ba las byang chub kyi sems gnyis ni aa dang
T02D2098:103a-17: buddho'o // de nyid nang gi 'jug pa'i rim pas rtogs par gyur pa ni buddha n'am no //
T02D2098:103a-18: dga' ba gsum lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor 'byung ba dang /
T02D2098:103a-19: lhan cig skyes pa dus gsum du 'byung ba ni t+ya dhva brti n'i'o //

T02D2098:103a-21: ji ltar nyams su blang ba yang dbyer mi phyed
T02D2098:103a-22: pa'i ye shes blo'i yul ring du gyur ba ni
T02D2098:103a-23: badzra ta'i kshna'o // de ltar yang sdug bsngal gcod par nus pa yang ma yin te /
T02D2098:103a-24: dam pa'i zhabs kyi padmo la btud pa'i drin gyis /
T02D2098:103a-25: skad cig la rnyed par gyur pas du: kha tstshe da'o //
T02D2098:103a-27: kye ho grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa de //
T02D2098:103a-28: gzhan nas mi rnyed bla ma'i zhal las dris //
T02D2098:103a-30: des gnang bar gyur pa'i rim pa ni pradzny'a dzny'a na'o //
T02D2098:103a-31: m'urti ni rgyun te bzhi pa'o //
T02D2098:103a-32: ya ni ya te gnas pa'i don to //
T02D2098:103a-33: de nyid gnyug ma'i ye shes rang gi mtshan nyid du byas pa ni dzny'a na ste /
T02D2098:103a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
T02D2098:103a-35: rdo rje nyid yin par k'a ya w'a ka go
T02D2098:103a-36: // yang ni b'a g'i shva ri ni gsung gi
T02D2098:103a-37: dbang phyug gi rgyud pas de nyid shes par bya
T02D2098:103a-38: // ste / lung dang rang gi rigs pa dang
T02D2098:103a-39: bla ma'i gdams ngag gis zhes gzhan du bstan to
T02D2098:103a-40: // ste / // aa la sogs pa'i don ni
T02D2098:103a-41: skye ba med pa'i bde ba chen po'i snying po
T02D2098:103a-42: // ste / // zhes dang / mngon par zhen
T02D2098:103a-43: pa dang bral ba'i stobs kyis dam tshig gi spyod
T02D2098:103a-45: rigs pas thams cad kyang de bzhin du bsdu ba
T02D2098:103b-0: dang / de kho na nyid @103b re re dang
T02D2098:103b-1: bral ba dang zhes bya ba'i don la yang mi
T02D2098:103b-3: dang / gnas pa'o // 'di ltar ni bshad zin
T02D2098:103b-5: aa las 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyud don a'o //
T02D2098:103b-6: don chen la sogs pa ni don che bas phan
T02D2098:103b-7: yon che ba 'byung bas na skye ba med pa'i
T02D2098:103b-8: snying rje'i snying po can ni yi ge dam pa
T02D2098:103b-9: aa las 'byung ba yin no zhes bya'o //
T02D2098:103b-10: mchog ni mchod pa dang rjed gzhi thams cad kyi srog tu gyur pa ste /
T02D2098:103b-11: khong nas 'byung bas na srog go //
T02D2098:103b-12: de'i phyir skye ba med pa mtshon par nus te /
T02D2098:103b-13: dper na srog gi rlung 'gags na thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T02D2098:103b-14: brjod pa dang bral bas phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba ste /
T02D2098:103b-15: brjod pa ni ming yin la de las blo skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2098:103b-16: thams cad du brjod pa ma bkag pa ni ma yin te /
T02D2098:103b-18: yan lag gi gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D2098:103b-19: de ltar yi ge gtso bo las mngon par 'phel
T02D2098:103b-20: ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi
T02D2098:103b-21: sa bon dang / snying po dang sngags su gyur pa'o //
T02D2098:103b-22: gsal yig ma 'phel ba ma yin te /
T02D2098:103b-23: srog tu brjod pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2098:103b-24: bcu gcig pa'i thig legs thabs kyi rang bzhin gzung ba'o //
T02D2098:103b-25: thabs su mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02D2098:103b-26: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i gur las /
T02D2098:103b-27: bde ba chen po 'khor pa khyab /
T02D2098:103b-28: bde ba spangs ni de ma yin //
T02D2098:103b-30: thig le spangs pa la rnyed par ma gsungs so //
T02D2098:103b-31: bde ba chen po ni shes rab ma yin te /
T02D2098:103b-33: bud med bzang mo'i reg bde ba //
T02D2098:103b-34: glu thos pa yi zhi ba bde //
T02D2098:103b-35: dri bsnams pa yi bde ba che //
T02D2098:103b-36: skyes nas reg pa'i bde ba che //
T02D2098:103b-37: bcud len rab tu sbyor ba yis //
T02D2098:103b-38: bde ba su zhig 'gog par byed //
T02D2098:103b-40: shes rab dang thabs tha mi dad pa nyid las
T02D2098:103b-41: dkyil 'khor pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D2098:103b-42: mchod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D2098:104a-1: nyon mongs pa gcod par byed do //
T02D2098:104a-3: sa'i khams rnam par dag pa ni gnyis med de /
T02D2098:104a-4: gti mug chen po'i mchod pa'o //
T02D2098:104a-5: re mi shes shing shes pa med pas na gti
T02D2098:104a-6: mug blo ste ma rig pa'i rtsa ba can gyi
T02D2098:104a-10: rlung gi khams rnam par dag pa ni 'gro 'ong med pa'i rang grol du gyur pa ste /
T02D2098:104a-11: phrag dog chen po'i mchod pa'o //

T02D2098:104a-14: tshor ba rnam par dag pa'i khams ni blo yis ma spags pa ste /
T02D2098:104a-15: chags pa chen po'i mchod pa'o //
T02D2098:104a-16: des mngon par zhen pa thams cad sel bar byed do //
T02D2098:104a-17: de ltar 'khor ba'i rnam par dag pa rigs dang de bzhin gshegs par bstan la /
T02D2098:104a-18: de yar ye shes kyis dag par byas la rtsod 'das su shes par bya'o //
T02D2098:104a-19: bstan pa la dgos pa med pa ma yin te /
T02D2098:104a-20: phal ba'i rnam par spangs pa'i phyir //
T02D2098:104a-21: bsgom par yang dag rab tu grags //
T02D2098:104a-22: phal ba'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni //
T02D2098:104a-23: bsgom pa de ni sgom pa min //
T02D2098:104a-25: 'dod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2098:104a-26: las sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin du bstan par bya
T02D2098:104a-27: ste / dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /
T02D2098:104a-28: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2098:104a-29: dga' gral gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D2098:104a-34: sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs brjod //
T02D2098:104a-36: rnam par smin pa de las bzlog / bde ba'i ye shes za ba nyid //
T02D2098:104a-37: rnam par nyed pa spyod pa mdzod //
T02D2098:104a-38: bdag gis bde ba spyad do zhes //
T02D2098:104a-39: mtshan nyid bral la gsum las gzhan //
T02D2098:104a-40: chags dang chags med rnam par spangs //
T02D2098:104a-41: zhes gsungs pas shes par bya'o //
T02D2098:104a-42: gzugs chen zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dbang bskur ba'i rang bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T02D2098:104a-43: de yang ye shes la dbang ba dang /
T02D2098:104a-44: nyon mongs pa la dbang ba dang /
T02D2098:104a-47: de yang gzugs lus che ba dang /
T02D2098:104a-48: kha dog dang dbyibs che ba dang /
T02D2098:104a-49: ming dang rgya che ba dang /
T02D2098:104a-50: dkyil 'khor che zhing yangs pa ste /
T02D2098:104b-0: brda dang @104b nyams su myong ba rtogs pa dang /
T02D2098:104b-1: don gcig pa nyid kyis gzugs dang don lus ni
T02D2098:104b-2: snang ba thams cad de chen po ni brdar gyur
T02D2098:104b-3: pa'i don bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du'o //
T02D2098:104b-4: kha dog dang lus ni bye brag 'dzin pa'i shes pa ste /
T02D2098:104b-5: nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
T02D2098:104b-6: cha ba ni mchod pa mchog gi dus su'o //
T02D2098:104b-7: snying por gyur pa ni de bzhin nyid rig pa ste /
T02D2098:104b-9: rang rig pa yi bdag nyid de //
T02D2098:104b-10: dag pa gzhan gyis grol mi 'gyur //

T02D2098:104b-13: btags pa de srid du brtags pa'i rtogs pa ste
T02D2098:104b-14: / de dag thams cad kyi byed pa po ni
T02D2098:104b-15: rlung lnga'i bdag nyid bcu'i ming can rnam shes kyi
T02D2098:104b-16: / bzhon pa ste / de yang dag par byed

T02D2098:104b-18: / bzhon pa ste / // thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jug pa nyid kyi che ba ste /

T02D2098:104b-20: chos mtha' dag gi 'obs kyis bskor ba'i nang du

T02D2098:104b-22: ste / srid pa'i shing spangs shing gtor bas bskyed
T02D2098:104b-23: pa las shin tu ring du skyes nas 'dod pa'i
T02D2098:104b-24: 'bras bu mig dga' ba bskyed pa dang /

T02D2098:104b-28: rgyu gsar du bskyed pa'i sred pa las ldog par 'gyur zhes gsungs pas so //
T02D2098:104b-29: dkyil 'khor chen po ni sku bzhi dbyer med 'khor lo ste /
T02D2098:104b-30: bde ba chen por gcig pas yangs pa'o //
T02D2098:104b-31: de nyid la dngos grub dang bar du gcod pa mi gnas pa'i don to //
T02D2098:104b-32: dman pa rnams kyis ni lus ngag gi brdas so //
T02D2098:104b-33: shes rab mtshon chen po la sogs pas ni chos bshad pa'i rang bzhin du bstan par bya ste /
T02D2098:104b-38: de nyid dgag sgrub dang bral ba dang nyams su myong ba dang /

T02D2098:121b-32: dbang bskur dpal ni rin chen sems ma'o //

T02D2098:121b-36: kun gyi bdag ces pa ni chos kyi sems ma'o //
T02D2098:121b-37: rdo rje 'chang zhes pa ni don yod grub pa'o //

T02D2098:121b-40: thugs che ba zhes pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D2098:121b-42: rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod /

T02D2098:121b-44: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yin//

T02D2098:121b-47: sku gsung thugs rdo rje 'dus pa ste /

T02D2098:121b-51: sngags dang lhar ni yang dag gnas //

T02D2098:122a-18: sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po'i stobs kyis 'gro

T02D2098:122a-35: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i man ngag go //

T02D2098:122a-40: sngags chos nyid lam du rig pa dang /
T02D2098:122a-41: bzod pa chos nyid du rig pa dus kyi tshe che ba ste /
T02D2098:122a-42: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no //

T02D2098:122a-47: skye med bde ba'i snying po can ni mchog ste zhes pa de nyid kyang bcos par ston pa'o //

T02D2098:122b-0: @122b thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D2098:122b-1: rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02D2098:122b-3: gang la zung du 'jug pa gnas pa ni theg pa chen po ste /

T02D2098:122b-5: mtshon cha chen po ni lam gyi bden pa ste /
T02D2098:122b-8: gzugs la rnam gsum shes bya ste //
T02D2098:122b-9: mchod pa byed pas mchod par bya //

T02D2098:122b-12: rdo rje zab mo ni thugs so //

T02D2098:122b-15: blo gros ni shes rab ste /
T02D2098:122b-16: don bzhin rig pa ni ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D2098:122b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa ni bshad zin to //

T02D2098:122b-20: bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud kun gyi rgyal po

T02D2098:122b-23: / rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan //
T02D2098:122b-24: zhes pa ni gser dang gser bzhin nam /
T02D2098:122b-25: rgya mtsho chu bo 'bab pa bzhin rig par bya'o //
T02D2098:122b-26: ye shes kyi sku ni ye shes sku rnams so //
T02D2098:122b-27: kun du bzang po dang blo gros bzang po ni 'jam dpal dang /
T02D2098:122b-28: sa'i snying po dang 'gro ba 'dzin ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa ste /
T02D2098:122b-29: de'i rnam par dag pa ni thabs du ma sprul pa'o //
T02D2098:122b-30: mtshan ma mi dmigs pa dang /

T02D2098:122b-33: yang nas dang 'gro ba'i rten gzhal yas khang dang /
T02D2098:122b-34: brten pa lha'i 'khor los mtshon pa'o //
T02D2098:122b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes pa ni /

T02D2098:122b-37: snying po che zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //

T02D2098:123a-2: zhes pas thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i dbyer med bstan pa'o //
T02D2098:123a-3: shes rab la sogs pa ni dus kyi mtha'i skad cig ma'o //
T02D2098:123a-4: de nyid 'dir rnal 'byor gyi lam du bya ba'i
T02D2098:123a-5: phyir mi g-yo zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2098:123a-7: rab tu dang ba'i bdag ces pa ni /
T02D2098:123a-8: lam gyi lus kyi rnyog pa brgyad pa'o //
T02D2098:123a-9: mngon sum pa zhes pa ni mngon sum pa 'dir rig pa'o //
T02D2098:123a-10: ji ltar na ye shes la sogs pa'o //

T02D2098:123a-13: // /'dod pa la sogs pa'i 'dir bshad bar bya ste /

T02D2098:123a-19: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
T02D2098:123a-21: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma chags pa'i dmyal ba sbyong bar byed do //
T02D2098:123a-22: byin pas yi dags sbyor bar byed do //
T02D2098:123a-23: re ba med pas byol song sbyong bar byed do //

T02D2098:123a-31: mos pa la spyod pa dang /
T02D2098:123a-32: las dang po pa rnams la gsang sngags dang /
T02D2098:123a-33: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /

T02D2098:123a-39: gcig pu kho na lhag pa'i dbye //
T02D2098:123a-41: mi shes pa ni gti mug go //
T02D2098:123a-42: dgra'i dregs pa ni bden pa gnyis med la the tshom za ba'o //

T02D2098:123a-46: dpal ni gzhung lugs kyi byin gyi rlabs so //

T02D2098:123a-48: steg ni lhag pa byang chub kyi sems so //

T02D2098:123b-0: de yang bla @123b ma'i brgyud thabs bsten pa dang /
T02D2098:123b-1: bsod nams las ni yang dag shes /
T02D2098:123b-3: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //
T02D2098:123b-5: rtog pa la sems brtan pas 'khor ba bsdigs pa'i brda'o //
T02D2098:123b-6: lag pa brgyad po kun bskyad cing //
T02D2098:123b-8: phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag gis /

T02D2098:123b-13: dga' ba bzhi don gyis lhan cig skyes pas gnon pa ste /
T02D2098:123b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo gcig gis
T02D2098:123b-15: gdan la reg par bzhengs so zhes pa'i don to
T02D2098:123b-16: // des don kun du bsgrub pa'i phyir rkang mthe ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2098:123b-17: srid pa de nyid du byed par yang sbyang ro //

T02D2098:123b-23: 'khor bas 'jig pa med pa de ni mtshon pa'o //
T02D2098:123b-24: nyams su myong ba ni rnam par rig pa nyid

T02D2098:123b-30: thams cad don dam pa byang chub kyi sems su ldan zhes bya'o //
T02D2098:123b-31: de bas bla ma mnyes pa las de'i bka' lung

T02D2098:123b-33: ste / rgyun du 'jug pa dang 'byung ba'i bya
T02D2098:123b-34: ba byed pa'i rnal ma'i yid nyid du 'jog par

T02D2098:123b-37: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
T02D2098:123b-39: nyams su myong ba'i phyir na des na sngon yongs
T02D2098:123b-40: su btang ba'i dbang po de yang yid dang bral

T02D2098:123b-43: du 'dir yang dbang po rnams yid kyi rjes su

T02D2098:124a-1: rtogs par 'di dag rab tu sbyor bar med pa ma yin zhes gsungs pas so //
T02D2098:124a-2: zung 'jug tu mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni /
T02D2098:124a-3: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
T02D2098:124a-5: srid par gyur pa ma yin pa ni //
T02D2098:124a-6: srid ba'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste //

T02D2098:124a-9: brgyud thabs bsten pa nyid kyis 'dra bar gyur pa ste /
T02D2098:124a-10: zangs las ra gan du gyur te /
T02D2098:124a-11: gser ma yin pa bzhin no //
T02D2098:124a-12: spangs pa ni spangs pa ste gser rnyed pa'i dus

T02D2098:124a-14: ; / bde ba dang bral ba ma yin te /
T02D2098:124a-15: srid pa gsum gyi rang bzhin dga' ba yin la /
T02D2098:124a-16: de la yang chen po pas dgos pa med pa'i lhan cig skyes ba nyid de /
T02D2098:124a-17: dper na nam mkha' la sprin nag po dang ser
T02D2098:124a-18: po la sogs pa bsal ba'i rjes sprin dkar yang
T02D2098:124a-19: dag pa'i dkar ba bzhin du dkar ba'i bde ba
T02D2098:124a-20: stong ba phra mo tsam mi gnas kyang bde bar
T02D2098:124a-21: 'thad de // 'od bzangs ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od //
T02D2098:124a-22: ces pas zla ba dang 'od bzhin dag pa dang bde ba la tha mi dad par 'char ro //
T02D2098:124a-23: phyi'i sgro 'dogs chod pa'i dag pa'i 'char ba ma yin te /
T02D2098:124a-24: nang rten 'brel gyi dus na nyi ma 'char ka dang shar ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar mdzes so //
T02D2098:124a-25: des tha dad gyur pa ma yin te /
T02D2098:124a-26: mtshon par byed pa gcig gis mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2098:124a-27: phyis rang rgyud du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02D2098:124a-28: 'di ni thabs dang shes rab las skyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid yin pas //
T02D2098:124a-29: rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag yongs su spangs
T02D2098:124a-30: nas bla na med pa'i longs spyod du nye bar
T02D2098:124a-31: 'gro zhing // 'gro ba 'di dag ni bde ba chen po'i rnam par 'gro bar 'gyur te /
T02D2098:124a-32: dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis phog pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs bzhin du /

T02D2098:124a-34: sen mo 'od la sogs pa la phyi nang sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D2098:124a-35: sngar bshad pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba thams cad grags pa'i mtshan dpe la sbyar ba dang /
T02D2098:124a-36: de nyid rnam par dag pa bde ba la sbyar ba'o //

T02D2098:124b-1: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
T02D2098:124b-3: nor bu ni rin po che'o //
T02D2098:124b-5: chags pa ni thig le ste bde ba dang ldan pa'o //

T02D2098:124b-7: ji ltar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2098:124b-8: sangs rgyas ni shigs pa med pa'i ham ngo //

T02D2098:124b-11: mtshan nyid mi mthun pas mtshon par mi nus pa ma yin te /

T02D2098:124b-13: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
T02D2098:124b-15: phyi nang gi bye brag gis sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
T02D2098:124b-16: ye shes mthong ba'i dus ni sa g-yos la sogs pa'i rtags 'byung bar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D2098:124b-17: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //
T02D2098:124b-19: sngar bzhin gyis kun rdzob kyi rdzu 'phrul bstan pa las /
T02D2098:124b-20: don gyi stobs chen po lnga dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2098:124b-21: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //

T02D2098:124b-24: de las gzhan pas bde ba chen po'i dran pa 'chang ba po /
T02D2098:124b-25: dran pa bzhi po zhes pa ni sngar gyi bye
T02D2098:124b-26: brag gis tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

T02D2098:124b-28: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /

T02D2098:124b-30: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /

T02D2098:124b-32: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D2098:124b-33: dus kyi ye shes bden par dran pa'o //
T02D2098:124b-34: ting nge 'dzin rgyal zhes pa ni sngar bzhin gyi
T02D2098:124b-35: bye brag gis seng ge rnam par rtse ba dang

T02D2098:124b-46: sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sogs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2098:124b-47: yon tan mtsho ji snyed kyi gnas byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2098:124b-48: lam gyi yan lag brgyad rig pa //

T02D2098:125a-11: mthong ba po'i lta ba kun nas ldang bar mi byed cing rtag pa dang /

T02D2098:128a-55: pa'i gzung ba'i mchog la dbyugs dbyung gnyis lhag par
T02D2098:128a-56: ston te // ting nge 'dzin lus can ni gang zag go //
T02D2098:128b-0: lus kyi @128b mchog ni chos sku'o //
T02D2098:128b-1: de nyid ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste /
T02D2098:128b-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa la sogs par snang ngo //
T02D2098:128b-4: de bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D2098:128b-6: lha'i dbang po ni khyab 'jug go //
T02D2098:128b-8: lha'i bdag po ni brgya byin no //
T02D2098:128b-9: lha ma yin gyi bdag po ni r'a hu la'o//
T02D2098:128b-10: 'chi med dbang po ni nye dbang ngo //
T02D2098:128b-11: lha'i bla ma ni phur bu'o //
T02D2098:128b-12: 'joms byed ni thags bzangs ris so //
T02D2098:128b-13: gnyis pa ni srin po'i bdag po'o //
T02D2098:128b-14: dbang phyug ni ma h'a de ba ste /
T02D2098:128b-15: bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa'i rang rang gi rgyal por bstod pa'o //
T02D2098:128b-16: de bas sems can thams cad sred pa'i dgon pa
T02D2098:128b-17: las rgal bar mdzad pa ni ston pa gcig pu
T02D2098:128b-18: ste / de bas na 'gro ba'i bla mar gyur pa'o //
T02D2098:128b-19: de ltar gyur par bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten la sogs pa'o //
T02D2098:128b-20: dgongs pa ji lta bu mnga' ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2098:128b-21: byams pa'i go chas chas pa ste //
T02D2098:128b-22: zhes pa ni phyogs med pa'o //
T02D2098:128b-23: snying rje yi ni ya la dab gos //
T02D2098:128b-24: zhes pa ni sdug bsngal dang bral bar byed ba ste bsrung ba'o //
T02D2098:128b-25: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02D2098:128b-26: zhes pa ni rtags dang don te shes rab dang rigs pas nang dang /
T02D2098:128b-27: phyi'i sgro 'dogs mi mnga' ba dang kha sbyor snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02D2098:128b-28: mi shes pa ni gti mug go //
T02D2098:128b-29: g-yul ngo ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i dus so //
T02D2098:128b-30: sel ba ni dag par mdzad pa'o//
T02D2098:128b-31: dpa' bo ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2098:128b-34: bdud 'dul ba ni btul ba ste rdo rje gdan la'o //
T02D2098:128b-35: de'i mthu ni bdud bzhi la sogs pa'o //
T02D2098:128b-36: mchod pa'i 'os su bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2098:128b-40: khyod nyid thams cad du 'khrul zhing rim gyis dbang
T02D2098:128b-41: po'i bye brag dang mthun par bstan pa khyod nyid
T02D2098:128b-43: mi 'gyur ba med ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2098:128b-44: de bas na 'di dag la gnyis sbyar te /
T02D2098:128b-46: gzhan pa yang mchod 'os ni thos pa dang dran pa mthar phyin pa'o //
T02D2098:128b-47: bstod 'os ni rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs pa'o //
T02D2098:128b-48: phyag gi gnas ni thams cad kyi skye gnas su gyur pas so //
T02D2098:128b-49: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os ni theg pa
T02D2098:128b-50: gsum gyi rang rang gi lam rgyud la sbyangs pa'o
T02D2098:128b-51: // bkur 'os ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ste /
T02D2098:129a-0: brjod par bya ba'i mchog ni theg pa chen po pa rnams @129a * //
T02D2098:129a-1: kyi ste rang bzhin gyis don phun sum tshogs pa snang bas so //
T02D2098:129a-2: phyag bya ba'i 'os ni sngags spyod pa rnams kyi ste rang rig ston pas so //
T02D2098:129a-3: bla ma'i rab ni dbang thob pa rnams kyi ste /
T02D2098:129a-4: de kho na nyid mthong ba dang /
T02D2098:129a-5: chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pas so //
T02D2098:129a-6: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes thugs su chud pa'i rdzu phrul gyis 'jig rten la sogs pa'o //
T02D2098:129a-7: gsum rig ni dus mkhyen pa /
T02D2098:129a-8: mchod pa mkhyen pa dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid mkhyen pa yin la /
T02D2098:129a-10: zhes bya ba ni mi slu zhing rig pa la the tshom mi mnga' ba'o //
T02D2098:129a-11: mngon shes drug ldan ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'o //
T02D2098:129a-12: rjes dran drug ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge
T02D2098:129a-13: 'dun dang yi dam dang tshig dran pa mnga' ba'o
T02D2098:129a-14: // byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa gzhan gyi yab tu gyur pa'o //
T02D2098:129a-15: sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po'i yang yab a'i //
T02D2098:129a-16: sngags pa zu 'phrul chen po ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2098:129a-17: 'jig rten 'das pa'i la sogs pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2098:129a-18: mjug bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2098:129a-19: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
T02D2098:129a-21: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
T02D2098:129a-23: rigs phyag rgya bzhi ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2098:129a-24: rtags phyag rgya bzhi ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus so'o //
T02D2098:129a-25: don phyag rgya bzhi ni lam gyi dus su'o //
T02D2098:129a-26: nyes mchis gyur pa la sogs bzod par mdzod //
T02D2098:129a-27: shes rab yul ni mtha' dang bral //
T02D2098:129a-28: zab mo'i don ni gzhal dka' bas //
T02D2098:129a-29: gzhal bya 'jal byed kyis stong pa'i //
T02D2098:129a-30: 'gro kun snying po len par shog / sngags pa rnal 'byor la mi mkhas //
T02D2098:129a-31: phal cher bag med lam 'gro la //
T02D2098:129a-32: snying po mngon rtogs 'di brjod pas //
T02D2098:129a-34: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02D2098:129a-35: don ni ngo bor 'gyur bar shog /'phags pa 'jam
T02D2098:129a-36: dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa
T02D2098:129a-37: snying po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2098:129a-38: slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
